articles.author: Elliot Smith
articles.title: European markets close higher amid talk of further Russia sanctions; Delivery Hero jumps 10% - CNBC
articles.description: European markets closed higher on Monday as Western powers prepare more sanctions against Russia following allegations of civilian massacres in Ukrainian towns.
articles.content:
LONDON European markets closed higher on Monday as Western powers prepared more sanctions against Russia following allegations of civilian massacres in Ukrainian towns.

articles.author: Alex Druce
articles.title: Miners nudge ASX closer to record high - news.com.au
articles.description: The Australian sharemarket on Monday moved within 100 points of its all-time high as the miners once again enjoyed the benefits of a commodity cycle supercharged by conflict in Eastern Europe.
articles.content: The Australian sharemarket started the week on the front foot, with a host of mining names performing strongly.The Australian sharemarket on Monday moved within 100 points of its all-time high as the… [+4456 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Prospective Chelsea owners Ricketts family give European Super League, Stamford Bridge pledge - ESPN
articles.description: The Ricketts family have outlined a list of promises should they buy Chelsea, including rejecting participation in a European Super League.
articles.content: The Ricketts family has outlined a list of promises should it win the bid to buy Chelsea, saying it would never allow the Premier League club to participate in a European Super League while also expl… [+1596 chars]
